thread.title: Ryan Gosling Watching His Young Self Dance Is The Most Adorably Awkward Thing You'll See Today
thread.title_full: Ryan Gosling Watching His Young Self Dance Is The Most Adorably Awkward Thing You'll See Today

author: Ali Velez
title: Ryan Gosling Watching His Young Self Dance Is The Most Adorably Awkward Thing You'll See Today
text:
View this image ›
youtube.com ID: 10324197 3. Here’s young Ben Affleck in The Voyage of the Mimi . BBC / Via youtube.com
Via youtube.com
 ID: 10324149 4. And a young Emma Stone playing against type in a school production of The Princess and the Pea . BBC / Via youtube.com
Via youtube.com
 ID: 10324153 5. And then, Graham Norton brought out the big guns. VIDEO of a very young Ryan Gosling in a dance recital. View this image ›
youtube.com ID: 10324154 6. Ryan of course, was a pretty good sport about it. View this image ›
youtube.com ID: 10324157 7. Ryan explained that the tween dance troupe scene could be pretty rough. View this image ›
youtube.com ID: 10324159 8. He talked about the fierce competition he faced while doing a “sort of Canadian Star Search .” View this image ›
youtube.com He continued, “They were dancing to Phil Collins’s “Two Hearts” and they had big, heart-shaped bows, and they were the ones to beat.”
ID: 10324160 9. But Ryan felt like he had it under control, with his perfect starting stance for his routine to “Everybody Dance Now.” View this image ›
youtube.com ID: 10324171 10. And right as he was about to start, the twins were in his sightline, ready to intimidate. View this image ›
youtube.com ID: 10324175 11. Savage AF. View this image ›
youtube.com ID: 10324179 12. But in the end, Ryan prevailed. View this image ›
youtube.com ID: 10324181 13. And then, it was time to relive the magic. Sit back and enjoy. View this image ›
youtube.com Those moves, tho!
ID: 10324184 14. OMG, adult Ryan watching little Ryan dance is a gift. View this image ›
youtube.com And those silver Hammer pants are the bow on top.
ID: 10324185 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
